edu.kit.informatik

Class Terminal

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.informatik.Terminal

  • public final class Terminal
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some simple methods for input/output from and to a terminal. Never modify this class, never upload it to Praktomat. This is only for your local use. If an assignment tells you to use this class for input and output never use System.out or System.in in the same assignment.
    Version:
    4
    Author:
    ITI, VeriAlg Group, IPD, SDQ Group

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void printLine(java.lang.String out)
      Print a String to the standard output.
      static java.lang.String readLine()
      Reads a line from standard input.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • printLine

        public static void printLine(java.lang.String out)
        Print a String to the standard output. The String out must not be null.
        Parameters:
        out - The string to be printed.

      • readLine

        public static java.lang.String readLine()
        Reads a line from standard input. Returns null at the end of the standard input. Use Ctrl+D to indicate the end of the standard input.
        Returns:
        The next line from the standard input or null.
